headline: Invitation Homes Announces Cash Dividend
summary: DALLAS, December 12, 2025--Invitation Homes Inc. (NYSE: INVH) ("Invitation Homes," the "Company," or "our"), the nation’s premier single-family home leasing and management company, announced today that it has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.30 per share payable on shares of its common stock, representing a 3.4% increase over the prior quarterly dividend of $0.29 per share. The dividend will be paid on or before January 16, 2026, to stockholders of record of the Company’s common stock as
